google-readability-todo.description:
Description

Finds TODO comments without a username or bug number.

The relevant style guide section is
https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#TODO_Comments
.

Corresponding cpplint.py check:
readability/todo
google-readability-todo.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

Options
Style
A string specifying the TODO style for fix-it hints. Accepted values are
Hyphen
and
Parentheses
. Default is
Hyphen
.
Hyphen
will format the fix-it as:
//
TODO:
username
-
details
.
Parentheses
will format the fix-it as:
//
TODO(username):
details
.
